id: scenario-value-scanner-single-parent-scenarios-community-skill-building and education support for economic advancement
title: Skill-building and education support for economic advancement
description: Skill-building and education support for economic advancement
content:
Scenario: Skill-building and education support for economic advancement
    Given Maria is stuck in low-wage medical assistant work
    And she wants to advance economically but has no time or resources for education
    When Maria seeks opportunities for economic advancement
    Then the community_elohim should connect her to education and training programs
    And it should identify programs compatible with single parent constraints
    And it should help her access support for education costs and childcare during training
    And skill-building should be realistic pathway to better wages
    And Maria should have community support for economic mobility despite solo parent limitations
